text: The Barkleys of Broadway is a 1949 American musical movie directed by Charles Walters and starring Fred Astaire, Ginger Rogers, Oscar Levant, Billie Burke, Gale Robbins, Jacques Fran√ßois, Clinton Sundberg, George Zucco. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1950. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 musical movies Category:American musical movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Charles Walters
title: The Barkleys of Broadway
